Subskills.name: Power Charge
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by charge.

Subskills.name: Forceful Grab
Subskills.description: Grab monsters on your path dealing damage and stunning them when you crash into terrain.

Subskills.name: Bodyslam
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to stunned targets.

Subskills.name: Resilience
Subskills.description: Take reduced damage while charging and shortly after.

Subskills.name: Overconfidence
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius of charge.

Subskills.name: Violent Momentum
Subskills.description: Increases the impact damage dealt by charge for each second spent charging.

Subskills.name: Mountain Fall
Subskills.description: The mountain breaks and huge boulders fall down on monsters around you when crashing into monsters or terrain.

Subskills.name: Berserking Ram
Subskills.description: Increases the speed of your charge.

Subskills.name: Crushing Impact
Subskills.description: Chance to critically hit with increased critical strike damage.

Subskills.name: Frenzied Mind
Subskills.description: Stack a buff increasing your arcane skill damage when hitting monsters with charge.

Subskills.name: Crashquake
Subskills.description: Unleash powerful shockwaves when crashing into monsters or terrain.

Subskills.name: Whirling Charge
Subskills.description: Charge forward in a straight line unleashing a massive whirlwind around you.
